attributes.action: Charge foreign Goods Vehicles for using Britains Roads
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As  HGV driver, I am duty bound to pay Road Tax or Road Toll Charges in every country in Europe. Whilst I drive in Britain, I pay extortionate Road Tax and a huge fuel levy. Foreigners pay zero and typically purchase all their fuel abroad to avoid  the hefty tax. So many accidents are caused by these foreigners and much damage is caused to our roads, coupled to the fact that they can undercut all costs. Some equilibrium must be found, one method would be a taxation
